name: Owolabi Legunsen
content: Owolabi Legunsen Owolabi Legunsen Assistant Professor 442A Gates Hall Department of Computer Science Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14850, USA Email: legunsen@cornell.edu Teaching Runtime Verification: Fall'20, Spring'22, Spring'23, Spring'24, Spring'25 Software Testing: Spring'21, Fall'21, Fall'22, Fall'23, Fall'25 Object-Oriented Programming and Data Structures: Fall'24 CV Scholar DBLP I am part of Cornell's growing Software Engineering Group. I am broadly interested in research on Software Engineering, with a focus on Software Testing and Runtime Verification. I am *always* seeking bright, motivated PhD students and Postdocs to work with. If you are interested to work with me, email me or drop by my office. Publications Faster Runtime Verification during Testing via Feedback-Guided Selective Monitoring Shinhae Kim, Saikat Dutta, and Owolabi Legunsen IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE 2025), pages to-appear, Seoul, Korea, November 2025.
